name: _R00TAccess
description: _R00TAccess is a modern day roleplaying game. Our game has one main goal and that is to make you feel like a hacker. We have designed an extensive UI and virtual Operating System for all of your hacking needs. Make your way up to the top of the hacker leaderboards by taking part in heists and or malicious activities on other hackers. Rise to the top and make your name known.
